title: ToasterSpin Config Schema
description: Schema for the ToasterSpin config file

version.description: The version of the config file schema using Semantic Versioning

rewards.description: The rewards that can be won

numeric.description: The number with witch to multiply the bet to get the payout

dozen.description: The number of points awarded for winning the 1st 12, 2nd 12, and 3rd 12 options

binary.description: The number of points awarded for winning the 1-18, 19-36, EVEN, and ODD options

colour.description: The number of points awarded for winning the RED and BLACK options

devices.description: The devices that can be used to play the game

carpet.description: The device that is used as carpet

ring.description: The device that is used as ring

chatBox.description: The device that is used as chat box

playerDetector.description: The device that is used as player detector

modem.description: The device that is used as modem
